snippet.title: Breakout 2000 - Atari Jaguar
snippet.description:
Breakout 2000 for the Atari Jaguar is based on the old game Breakout that we all know and love.
It's been enhanced into more of a 3D-ish mode, which is pretty cool.
The Breakout Classic mode that is included is lacking, in my opinion, but that's ok, since I really just want to play 2000.
Telegames (I believe) released this as well as a few others to gauge interest and viability in more Jaguar games that they either had finished or close-to, however, the response was not enough for Telegames to continue production on the other unreleased games :-(
